title: lemme give you money
body:
I just cant buy RP I want to shove money in your face let me
it says an error has occurred try again later

replies.body: I'd prefer poro snax over money, but I'm here to help anyway!  There could be an error with the finalization or payment of method being used, but I can't really say for sure.  For this specific issue, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can take a look.  We'll figure out what's going on so you can get that RP!
